loginnull: User name and password are required
deletemessageok: Do you want to empty the message board? Please confirm.
deletepost: Are you sure you want to delete the post?
siteSes_keys: For search engine optimization, please separate keywords with ','.
siteSes_desc: Description is used for search engine optimization and displayed in search results.
siteSes_sina: Give your website a nice name and display it in the tab bar.
siteSes_sige: Separator "-" , "|" ，Or use other punctuation to match the segmentation.
siteSes_tizo: Correct the time zone and set it to correspond to your region. The default is Asia / Shanghai.
siteSet_ruyo: If there is any omission, please feedback to me
siteSes_ponu: The number of articles loaded in a single time. When there are many articles, the loading speed will be affected.
siteSes_lang: Set the global language of the website. You can change the language file yourself.
siteSes_tomo: This item requires the top bar color to be transparent or left blank.
siteSes_toma: Fill in the binary color code to determine the overall color of the website.
siteSes_baim: Upload a 1:1 square background and give priority to the upload background image.
siteSes_geim: Upload a 1:1 square avatar, and the uploaded avatar will be displayed first.
siteSes_nina: This name is not the same as the site name. It is only displayed as a nickname.
siteSes_augr: Personal signature, a string of small characters displayed below the user name.
siteSes_qrco: Upload QR code pictures and display the uploaded QR code first.
siteSes_maps: The default address is preferred for sending documents. It can be changed separately when sending a document.
siteSes_emal: Set the mailbox for the administrator to receive reminders. It is recommended to bring your own mailbox.
siteSes_user: The login name used for background login. Letters are recommended.
siteSes_pass: The password used to log in to the background. It is recommended to use a complex password.
siteSes_pasd: Please enter the password again to ensure that the values entered are the same.
siteSes_fixe: Sticky top bar display, always displayed at the top of the screen without disappearing.
siteSes_robo: Prohibit search engines from crawling web pages and generating robot protocols.
siteSes_time: Time format, Y M D H: I stands for mm / DD / yyyy time.
siteSes_log1: If the access log is greater than 100MB by default, recording will be stopped.
siteSes_log2: The login log records the IP address of the abnormal login.
siteSes_weih: The maintenance mode is not supported temporarily, and the support will be updated later.
linkDBerror: Unable to connect to the database!
installError01:
Error information troubleshooting, you can:
1. Check whether the server address is wrong. The default is localhost.
2. Check whether your database user name and password are correct.2. Check whether your database user name and password are correct.
3. The database name needs to be created in MySQL in advance.

If the attempt fails, you can contact the administrator for helpbr>
rockstali@outlook.com
linkOK01: Remember the user name and password, and enter the background to change the password
linkOK04: Click me to go to the home page~
